resources.string: " DashBuddy reads information from the Dasher app screen to automatically track your miles, log offer details, and record your earnings. This service never collects passwords or personal information. This permission is required to enable automatic tracking features. "

We make tracking your dashes easier! Interactions in this app happen within its Bubble. In addition to notifications, we also need to ask for some other permissions. Please enable the following services:
Allows DashBuddy to show important alerts and the floating bubble button. After enabling, tap the bubble button in the notification to start the service.
This is the core permission. It allows the app to read screen text from the Dasher app to automatically log offer details, track dash progress, and provide overlays.
Needed to track mileage for tax purposes and to provide accurate delivery time estimates. Your location is only tracked during an active dash.
Required to see new order notifications and tip-added alerts when the Dasher app is in the background. This helps ensure no opportunities are missed.
